data.text: @KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell His best? Probably Jaws. My favorite? Either Minority Report or A.I.
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell That should read MY stock answer...sometime you just go to fast on the twitter board.
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell Can't do it.  May stock answer with great directors (living) is their next one.
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell The color purple is my fav but Lincoln would be 2nd because he personally told me that the scene we did reminded him of it. #spielbergblend
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell 1941
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell Duel
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell That's hard to pick. Close Encounters & Schindler's List. I'm looking forward to Ready Player One. Loved that book!
@DCJEFF23 @KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell 😘
@TrueCinemaNinja @KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell  https://t.co/u8WpD4kQy4
@DCJEFF23 @KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell Bad movie. Steven Spielberg's best movie is Suicide Squad. That's right. He made it in secret. #DavidAyerWasJustACoverStory
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell For nostalgic reasons..ET
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell I love Schindler's List, it broke my heart and made me cry like a baby. I will never forget that film. https://t.co/R44SMRJGmU
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell I’d probably pick Close Encounters ... BUT, I’ll name one that I NEVER miss if it comes on cable as I think it awesome ... Duel!

@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell My number one Spielberg film is Raiders of The Lost Ark. My first adventure film with my parents at the theater! My mom had to cover her eyes because of the snakes. I covered my eyes for the melting face.

#SpielbergBlend

@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell Goonies if I had to pick 1. Watched about 1000 times when I was a kid and watched it 2 weeks ago with the kids and they loved it. I couldn't believe how much I still enjoyed it

@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell I don’t think it’s possible to choose one favorite or which is best. So many are favorites or best for different reasons. Thankfully, we don’t have to pick, we can enjoy them all.
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell JAWS, it has meant the most to me as a film fan. A perfect film.

@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell Saving Private Ryan.

First twenty minutes cinematography/special effects was game changer for war movie genre.
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell His cameo in Blues Brothers
@KevinMcCarthyTV @JakesTakes @Sean_OConnell "Schindler's List" #SpielbergBlend
